title: Group portrait of young men and women, including young woman on right wearing light colored horizontal striped skirt, dark belt and shoes, light colored socks, and button down collared blouse with rolled sleeves, seated on arm of sofa with left arm around young man wearing dark pants and light colored short sleeve polo shirt, kneeling next to sofa, gathered in interior with floral rug and paisley style patterned sofa, door with transom in background
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
